snippet: Juventus celebrated its third straight Serie A title with a 3-0 home victory over Cagliari on Sunday to reach 102 points for the season, a record in the major European leagues.
lead_paragraph: Juventus celebrated its third straight Serie A title with a 3-0 home victory over Cagliari on Sunday to reach 102 points for the season, a record in the major European leagues.

headline.main: Juventus Beats Cagliari to Set European Points Record
headline.print_headline: Juventus beats Cagliari to set new points record
